name: Crystal Cavern (SANCHAY)
description:
You goal is to get all the crystals in the 5 caverns by doing some puzzles. You will fall ,Get back up again (and fall again until you win .duh?).  

NOTE:  Falling down into the abyss is bad but you will respawn in the same level but when you get hit by the cannons you instantly die and respawn back at LEVEL 1. So CANNONS = BAD

Controls: WASD/Movement controls i.e. W/forward S/backwards A/left D/right

Updates coming soon.......First update will be adding music wich will be this Monday

Try my other games too and follow me on itch and also subscribe me on youtube where I will upload devlogs of my next BIG game and also updates for this game.

REQUIRMENTS:

Ram: 4Gb (Required)  6Gb (Recommended)   8Gb(Best experience)

Processor: AMD phenom ii x4 or above

Graphics: Intel Intergrated or above
